text: Jean-Léon Gérôme (11 May 1824 – 10 January 1904) was a French painter and sculptor. Today he is mostly known for painting people in historical settings. File:Jean-Léon Gérôme, Phryne revealed before the Areopagus (1861) - 01.jpg|Phryne before the Areopagus, 1861 File:Gérôme - Summer Afternoon on a Lake.jpg|Summer Afternoon on a Lake, ca. 1895 File:Gerome - Diogenes.jpg|Diogenes (1860), Walters Art Museum File:Réception du Grand Condé à Versailles (Jean-Léon Gérôme, 1878).png|Reception of Le Grand Condé at Versailles (1878) File:Jean-Léon Gérôme - On the Desert - Walters 3734.jpg|On the Desert. title: Jean-Léon Gérôme
